subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Nash had a goal and an assist, and Mackenzie Skapski stopped 24 shots in his N.H.L. debut in the Rangers’ 3-1 win over the Buffalo Sabres on Friday.
snippet: Nash had a goal and an assist, and Mackenzie Skapski stopped 24 shots in his N.H.L. debut in the Rangers’ 3-1 win over the Buffalo Sabres on Friday.
